name: Iron Axe
description: A heavy iron axe with a sharp blade, designed for chopping wood or cleaving through enemies.
looks: The iron axe has a long wooden handle with a metal head. The head is curved and has a sharp edge on one side for cutting.

special_weapon_skils.axe_mastery: Grants a bonus to Axe Mastery skill.

name: Dagger
description: A small and lightweight dagger, perfect for quick and precise attacks.
looks: The dagger has a sharp and narrow blade made of polished steel. The handle is wrapped in leather for a comfortable grip.

special_weapon_skills.dagger_proficiency: Increases damage and accuracy when using daggers.

name: Iron Helmet
description: A sturdy iron helmet that provides good protection for the head.
looks: The iron helmet is made of solid iron with a smooth surface. It has a rounded shape with a face guard that covers the lower part of the face. There are small openings for the eyes and a ventilation hole at the top.

name: Iron Helmet
description: A sturdy iron helmet that provides good protection for the head.
looks: The iron helmet is made of solid iron with a smooth surface. It has a rounded shape with a face guard that covers the lower part of the face. There are small openings for the eyes and a ventilation hole at the top.

name: Adamantium Sword
description: A legendary sword forged from adamantium, known for its incredible strength and sharpness.
looks: The Adamantium Sword is a beautifully crafted weapon with a long, silver blade. The hilt is wrapped in black leather with intricate patterns engraved into the metal.

special_weapon_skills.swordsmanship: Grants a bonus to Swordsmanship skill when wielded.

special_effects.paralysis: Has a chance to paralyze the target for a short duration.

name: Iron Boots
description: Sturdy iron boots that provide strong protection for the feet and ankles.
looks: The iron boots are made of solid iron with a smooth surface. They cover the feet and ankles completely and have thick soles for added durability.

name: Steel Chestplate
description: A heavy and durable chestplate made from hardened steel.
looks: The Steel Chestplate is a solid piece of armor that covers the entire chest and upper torso. It is made from thick steel plates with reinforced edges and has adjustable straps for a secure fit.
